statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 5 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 4 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -1 \\ 4 \\ -5 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 8 \\ -7 \\ -17 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 0 \\ 3 \\ 5 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 4 \\ 1 \\ -1 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -1 \\ 4 \\ -5 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ 8 \\ -7 \\ -17 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
